channel.title: [REL]AleroBio[REL]
channel.description:
first things first , i've decided to go back to runescape and just didn't feel like running the server anymore, i've held over 150players on the server it is very stable, there was never a time that it lagged, of cours we were running the server on a very good vps, over 30gbs of RAM... but here you go....
Information
tweaked the combat and hybriding a bit. changed the hunter skill icon inside of the skill tab made it so when in fun pk u do not loose items. fixed the client so that when you open up the skill cape shop your client doesn't freeze. spent two weeks on the economy and drops... finished adding frost dragons for donators only! worked on the home for a while asked my players about where and what they wanted so I Garentee people will love the home. tweaked some items like Chaotics and what not to make them more, Realistic. Vesta long sword isn't overpowered anymore. fixed 90% of the memory leaks updated the cache downloader, works 100% added overloads to Herblore, just add super set together. tweaked all the skills to make them give the perfect amount of xp each. no more one hit 99's. much more but not going to say it all just test it out to find them out.
Now for the pictures.
Home: [IMG]http://i1015.photobucket.com/albums/af273/rawbie/newhome.jpg[/img]
Hunter in Quest tab now: [IMG]http://i1015.photobucket.com/albums/af273/rawbie/hunterinquesttab.jpg[/img]
Skillcape shop doesn't freeze(need client for that): [IMG]http://i1015.photobucket.com/albums/af273/rawbie/nomorefreeze.jpg[/img]
Dungeoneering in Skill Tab: [IMG]http://i1015.photobucket.com/albums/af273/rawbie/dungskill.jpg[/img]
Summoning gives 138 Combat: [IMG]http://i1015.photobucket.com/albums/af273/rawbie/138.jpg[/img]
Old skilling area from last release: [IMG]http://i1015.photobucket.com/albums/af273/rawbie/skill.jpg[/img]
[URL=http://"http://up.ht/mRohQp"]Download link #1 Uppit[/URL]
http://uppit.com/cwh3w6cjiu3q/alerobio.rar http://www.mediafire.com/?op2rg8pd64p08ia
Now to the Credits.
25% me, Rawbie 5% to who ever added dungeoneering 70% to hybrid forthe base
^ if i fogot anybody just post and i'll keep it updated

item.title: [REL]AleroBio[REL]
item.dc:creator: @rawbie rawbie
item.description:
@rawbie wrote:

first things first , i’ve decided to go back to runescape and just didn’t feel like running the server anymore, i’ve held over 150players on the server it is very stable, there was never a time that it lagged, of cours we were running the server on a very good vps, over 30gbs of RAM… but here you go…

Information

tweaked the combat and hybriding a bit.
changed the hunter skill icon inside of the skill tab
made it so when in fun pk u do not loose items.
fixed the client so that when you open up the skill cape shop your client doesn’t freeze.
spent two weeks on the economy and drops…
finished adding frost dragons for donators only!
worked on the home for a while asked my players about where and what they wanted so I Garentee people will love the home.
tweaked some items like Chaotics and what not to make them more, Realistic.
Vesta long sword isn’t overpowered anymore.
fixed 90% of the memory leaks
updated the cache downloader, works 100%
added overloads to Herblore, just add super set together.
tweaked all the skills to make them give the perfect amount of xp each.
no more one hit 99’s.
much more but not going to say it all just test it out to find them out.

Now for the pictures.

Home:

Hunter in Quest tab now:

Skillcape shop doesn’t freeze(need client for that):

Summoning gives 138 Combat:

Old skilling area from last release:
